DOC.brief_summary: Prior study show contradictory result best type TENS chronic pain pathology . Therefore want evaluate efficacy assessment TENS patient chronic low back pain chronic lumbo-radiculalgia . The functional ability score evaluate Roland scale 6 week .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Reducing Effect Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain Lumbo-radiculalgia
DOC.criteria: Stable chronic low back pain stable chronic lumboradiculalgia Patients pain score least superior equal 4 Patients follow pain clinic Written inform consent Prior ambulatory TENS practice Lumboradiculalgia pathology surgery within 3 month inclusion Acute low back pain bilateral lumboradiculalgia Acute radiculalgia Surgery plan within 6 month Pacemaker Symptomatic low back pain
